data.caption: Resignation
data.news_body: Naga Dhunseri Group Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Resignation of Mr Ayush Beriwala as Chief Financial Officer of the company w.e.f. March 31, 2026.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Naga Dhunseri Group Limited has informed the Exchange regarding  Board meeting held on February 12, 2026.

data.caption: Appointment
data.news_body: Naga Dhunseri Group Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of Mr Sudarshan Mall as Chief Financial Officer of the company w.e.f. April 01, 2026.
